USA.hover: "USA has a strong participation in carbon credits trading, covering over 80% of the market."

China.hover: "China has moderate participation in carbon credits trading, covering between 60% and 80% of the market."

India.hover: "India's carbon credits market is developing, with coverage between 40% and 60%."

Brazil.hover: "Brazil has limited participation in carbon credits trading, covering between 20% and 40% of the market."

South Africa.hover: "South Africa has minimal participation in the carbon credits market, covering less than 20%."
